contents.text: Thank you for calling Mattermost South Bay, your trusted partner for secure team collaboration and messaging under IT control.
For information on cloud or self-managed deployments, press 1.
To learn about our cloud infrastructure deployment options, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a cloud deployment specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to set up Mattermost's cloud messaging service for my team.
I’m looking for cloud hosting options to set up a secure group chat platform for my veteran support team.
Connect me with a cloud engineer to configure a scalable AWS-based Mattermost deployment.
I need help setting up Mattermost in the cloud for my team.
I’d like to discuss cloud deployment configurations and pricing for hosting my research collaboration instance.

contents.text: For on-premise solutions and licensing details, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to an on-premise solutions expert.

navigationGoals: I need licensing details and installation steps for an on-premise Mattermost server.
I want details on licensing and self-hosting requirements for running Mattermost on our own servers.
I need to discuss on-premise installation requirements and enterprise licensing for Mattermost.
I want information on installing Mattermost on my own server and the related costs.
I need information on on-premise installation requirements and licensing costs for a self-hosted server.

contents.text: For support and maintenance options, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I'm having connection issues with our Mattermost instance and need technical support.
I need help troubleshooting connectivity issues with my existing Mattermost instance.
I want to troubleshoot our LDAP integration and API errors with technical support.
I’m having trouble with the Mattermost app and need technical assistance.
I’m experiencing a connection timeout error with my Mattermost instance and need technical support to resolve it.

contents.text: For account and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to billing and account services.

navigationGoals: I have a billing question about our Mattermost subscription invoice.
I’d like to review my current subscription billing and discuss upgrading my support plan.
Please connect me to billing to get our annual subscription invoice and update payment info.
I’d like to review my billing statement and payment options.
I want to clarify my subscription billing cycle and get a copy of my latest invoice.
